author: oumolayna
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

<!-- 
Hello guys . i would like to talk about the newly added operators such as " a ? b : c " and " || and && " also " ?? and ??= "  the reason me and many others like me loved powershell is because of its English-Like cmdlets just like jeffery said "you think about something you type it and you get it " by please try to keep powershell development with the same concept and don't make it just like another programming language !!! i hope this is clear 
Thank you ... Keep Powershell Great -->

comments.author: vexx32
comments.body:
Closing for now as there is no issue description.

If you'd like to update the issue description and request it be re-opened when you have further detail, feel free. 🙂

title: Feature Request - Keep Powershell English-Like
